EndpointSchema.name: SCORACLE.BB
EndpointSchema.md: Generic basketball oracle that can query boxscores and key statistiscs from a specific game in any of the American pro, semi-pro, and collegiate leagues. More details can be found on the project's Github repository.

queryList.query: Basketball Final Boxscore or Final Statistic
